item.title: 2019未来杯高校AI挑战赛: 互娱-漫画人脸识别
item.description: 初赛中，选手需要基于给定的训练数据设计模型，判断给定的一对漫画图像和真实图像是否是同一个人。请将预测的结果按照测试集id顺序输出，以便平台对提交模型的结果进行验证。

item.title: Context-Aware Multi-Modal Transportation Recommendation
item.description: The competition consists of two tasks with the detail below. Task 1: Recommend the most appropriate transport mode. For task 1, participates are required to post the external data in the forum on how to access the external data, and provide sample codes in Python. Task 2: Open research/application challenge. For task 2, a data description as well as how to access the external data must be described in the proposal.

item.title: CLEF 2019 Lab ProtestNews
item.description: The task ProtestNews aims at extracting event information from news articles across multiple countries.

item.title: 3D-WiDGET challenge
item.description: 3D reconstruction is mostly evaluated qualitatively. With this dataset, we are introducing a new difficult quantitative task, the 3D IQ test task (3D-IQTT).

item.title: Habitat Challenge 2019
item.description: The objective of Habitat Challenge is to benchmark the state-of-the-art in goal-directed visual navigation around the PointGoal task as defined by Anderson et al. The challenge is built on top of the Habitat stack.

item.title: Google Landmark Recognition 2019
item.description: Label famous (and not-so-famous) landmarks in images

item.title: Google Landmark Retrieval 2019
item.description: Given an image, can you find all of the same landmarks in a dataset?

item.title: 2019未来杯高校AI挑战赛: 城市-房产租金预测
item.description: 线上比赛要求参赛选手根据给定的数据集，建立模型，预测房屋租金。

item.title: Freesound Audio Tagging 2019
item.description: Automatically recognize sounds and apply tags of varying natures

item.title: 阿里巴巴优酷视频增强和超分辨率挑战赛
item.description: 比赛要求通过训练样本对视频增强和超分模型进行建模，对测试集中的低分辨率视频样本预测高分辨率视频。其中，高分辨率视频来自优酷高清媒资库，优酷拥有视频的知识产权。低分辨率视频的生成模型是模拟实际业务中的噪声模式。

item.title: RecSys Challenge 2019
item.description: This year's challenge is to develop a session-based and context-aware recommender system to adapt a list of accommodations according to the needs of the user.

item.title: CCKS 2019 人物关系抽取
item.description: 在本次任务中，我们重点关注人物之间的关系抽取研究，简称IPRE（Inter-Personal Relationship Extraction）。给定一组人物实体对和包含该实体对的句子，找出给定实体对在已知关系表中的关系。

item.title: Geopolitical Forecasting [GF] Challenge 2
item.description: Solvers, whether individuals or teams, will create innovative solutions and methods to produce forecasts to a set of more than 300 questions referred to as Individual Forecasting Problems (IFPs), released regularly over the course of the nine-month Challenge.

item.title: Ciphertext Challenge II
item.description: Your mission this time: to correctly match each piece of ciphertext with its corresponding piece of plaintext. Daunting! Also, there are some new ciphers in play this time, which will involve some meta-puzzling. Enjoy!

item.title: 2019 Thales AIChallenge4Health
item.description: The purpose of this challenge is to carry out spot detection in X-ray medical images in the surgical field.

item.title: iMet Collection 2019 - FGVC6
item.description: This is a Kernels-only competition. Recognize artwork attributes from The Metropolitan Museum of Art

item.title: Workshop on Autonomous Driving 2019 | Challenge
item.description: We host a challenge to understand the current status of computer vision algorithms in solving the environmental perception problems for autonomous driving. We have prepared a number of large scale datasets with fine annotation, collected and annotated by Berkeley Deep Driving Consortium, nuTonomy and DiDi. Based on the datasets, we have define a set of four realistic problems and encourage new algorithms and pipelines to be invented for autonomous driving. More specifically, they are nuScenes challenge Challenge 1: nuScenes 3D Detection Challenge 2: BDD100K and D²-City Detection Domain Adaptation Challenge 3: D²-City and BDD100K Tracking Domain Adaptation

item.title: iNaturalist 2019 at FGVC6
item.description: Fine-grained classification spanning a thousand species

item.title: Jigsaw Unintended Bias in Toxicity Classification
item.description: This is a Kernels-only competition. Detect toxicity across a diverse range of conversations
